blogPost.excerpt: Sprint Poker is an intuitive, lightweight estimation tool that fits into your existing Jira workflow. 🗳️ Estimates that sync back to Jira automagically 🃏 Interactive cards and custom estimation scales ⏰ Async friendly for distributed teams
blogPost.body: Sprint Poker is an intuitive, lightweight estimation tool that fits into your existing Jira workflow. 🗳️ Estimates that sync back to Jira automagically 🃏 Interactive cards and custom estimation scales ⏰ Async friendly for distributed teams
blogPost.title: Sprint Poker by Parabol - Remotely bring planning poker to life
blogPost.author: Jordan Husney

localize.description: Sprint Poker是一个直观的，轻量级的估算工具，适合你现有的Jira工作流程。🗳️ 估算可以自动同步回Jira 🃏 交互式卡片和自定义估算尺度 ⏰ 对分布式团队的同步友好。
localize.tagline: 远程将规划扑克带入生活

localize.description: Sprint Poker是一個直觀的，輕量級的估算工具，適合你現有的Jira工作流程。🗳️ 估算可以自動同步回Jira 🃏 交互式卡片和自定義估算尺度 ⏰ 對分佈式團隊的同步友好。
localize.tagline: 遠程將規劃撲克帶入生活

previous.title: President Biden will announce later Tuesday that Merck & Co. will help make Johnson & Johnson's one-shot COVID-19 vaccine in an unusual agreement between two competitors that could lead to a significant boost in supply, the Washington Post reported. $JNJ https://t.co/avxTv8aJLI https://t.co/2dAorcqFix

localize.full_text: 据华盛顿邮报报道，总统拜登将在周二晚些时候宣布，默克公司将帮助生产强生公司的一针COVID-19疫苗，这是两个竞争对手之间的一项不同寻常的协议，可能会导致供应量大幅增加。$JNJ https://t.co/avxTv8aJLI https://t.co/2dAorcqFix
據華盛頓郵報報道，總統拜登將在週二晚些時候宣佈，默克公司將幫助生產強生公司的一針COVID-19疫苗，這是兩個競爭對手之間的一項不同尋常的協議，可能會導致供應量大幅增加。$JNJ https://t.co/avxTv8aJLI https://t.co/2dAorcqFix

next.title: RT @AP: Six Dr. Seuss books — including “And to Think That I Saw It on Mulberry Street” and “If I Ran the Zoo” — will stop being published…

localize.full_text: RT @AP: 六本苏斯博士的书--包括《我在桑树街看到的》和《如果我开动物园》--将停止出版... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 六本苏斯博士的书--包括 "想想我在桑树街看到了它 "和 "如果我跑了动物园"--将停止出版，因为种族主义和不敏感的图像，保存和保护作者遗产的业务说。https://t.co/FB2boW7ao0。

localize.full_text: RT @AP: 六本蘇斯博士的書--包括《我在桑樹街看到的》和《如果我開動物園》--將停止出版... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 六本蘇斯博士的書--包括 "想想我在桑樹街看到了它 "和 "如果我跑了動物園"--將停止出版，因爲種族主義和不敏感的圖像，保存和保護作者遺產的業務說。https://t.co/FB2boW7ao0。
